name: Destroyer Of Worlds (itch)
description:
This is a game I made for Ludum Dare 38. The theme was "A small world". This game was made in 48 hours.

Features:

  • Control a third person character on a spherical world
  • Shoot bad guys
  • Don't get swarmed
  • Rinse-and-repeat

Future features would be stuff like more weapons, different bad guys, etc.

I streamed most of development here: Twitch Stream (see saved videos)
